entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 60 gusting to 80 this morning. High plus 2. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Friday 29 April 2016

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Friday 29 April 2016
